name: Barbarian
description: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage.
equipmentDesc: You start with the following equipment, in addition to the equipment granted by your background.
(a) a greataxe or (b) any martial melee weapon
(a) two handaxes or (b) any simple melee weapon
An explorer's pack and four javelins.

skills.display: Choose two from Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival
